alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 7:09PM CDT until June 10 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Walthall County in southern Mississippi... Southeastern Pike County in southern Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Herman, or 15 miles northwest of Franklinton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Tylertown and Mount Herman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
